name: Wo-class Aircraft Carrier
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose one of your 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock & 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Northern Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Sink!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to one of your opponent's level 0 or lower characters, put it into his or her waiting room, and reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it into your hand. (If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)
flavorText: Leave… your Zero behind and leave……

name: Final Mode, Northern Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【CONT】 Experience If all of the cards in your level are 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(1)] During the turn that this card was placed on the stage from your hand, when this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock.

name: Ne-class Heavy Cruiser
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may choose a character in your waiting room, and put it on the top of your deck.

name: Midway Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【ACT】 [(1)] Choose one of your 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in the original order. 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other level 0 or lower characters. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Final Mode, Midway Princess in the Deep Sea" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】.

name: Aircraft Carrier Ogre in the Deep Sea
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavorText: I will sink you… as many times…… as many times as it takes……!

name: Armored Aircraft Carrier Ogre in the Deep Sea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, and that character gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters you have.

name: Armored Aircraft Carrier Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: Airfield Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters in front of this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [(3)] When a card named "I told you… it's hopeless…" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your clock, and return it to your hand.
flavorText:
…… It's… hot?
It's hot…… isn't it…?

name: Tsu-class Light Cruiser
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you use an 【ACT】, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When an opponent's character with "Aircraft Carrier（空母）"or "Aircraft Carrying（空母）" in its trait is placed on the stage from his or her hand, choose one of your opponent's characters, and that character gets -1 soul until end of turn.

name: Ni-Class Destroyer
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it into his or her stock. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your opponent's deck into his or her waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of other 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters you have is four or more, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Aircraft Carrier Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room. If you do, put that character into your opponent's clock. 【AUTO】 When you level up, this card gets "【AUTO】 Encore [(1)]" until end of turn.
flavorText:
Become… a mass of fire…
and sink……!

name: Berserker Mode, Port Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【CONT】 If a card named "Port Princess in the Deep Sea" is in your clock, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Nothing… you don't understand anything at all…" is in your climax area, you may choose a card in your clock, and return it to your hand. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Floating Fortress
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your 《Fleet in the Deep Sea》 characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: I-class Destroyer
text: 【CONT】 You can put any number of cards with the same card name as this card into your deck. 【CONT】 Experience This card gets +2500 power for each card named "Destroyer I-class" in your level.

name: So-class Submarine
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have any other characters, this card gets +1500 power and this card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects.

name: Fall!

text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavorText: I will sink you… no matter how many times… it takes.

flavorText: Now you've done it… I will also leave you in pain……!

name: Christmas, Northern Princess in the Deep Sea
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your opponent's clock into his or her waiting room.
